title: Accessories
content:
Spark Shar's Temptation Silver Pendant Spineshudder Amulet Tarnished Charm The Blast Pendant The Ever-Seeing Eye The Sapphire Spark Wakeful Amulet

Amulets are a type of Accessories in Baldur's Gate 3. Amulets can be equipped in their designated inventory slot and provide different bonuses for the character. Below you can find a list with all the Amulets in Baldur's Gate 3.
